WSEventName.label: Unique Key for the Alert Websocket Event
WSEventName.tooltip: Specify a unique name to identify this websocket event type.

Reward1Name.label: Title of Twitch Reward
Reward1Name.tooltip: Specify the name of the Twitch Reward that will trigger this event when detected.

Reward1ActivationType.label: Activation Point
Reward1ActivationType.tooltip: Set whether the reward should be triggered immediately on reward redemption by viewer, or when the reward is accepted/rejected from the reward queue. Note: twitch currently doesn't return a way to distinguish between Accept or Reject so Reject will still trigger the reward.

Reward1ImageFile.label: Path to Alert Image file
Reward1ImageFile.tooltip: Specify the path to the Alert Image to trigger (Include file extension).

Reward1TransitionType.label: In Transition
Reward1TransitionType.tooltip: Set how the counter transitions in

Reward1ExpandDirection.label: Text expand direction
Reward1ExpandDirection.tooltip: Determineds in what direction the number/text expand when getting bigger, 9 to 10 or 99 to 100 etc

Reward1AlignVertical.label: Align Vertical
Reward1AlignVertical.tooltip: Align the text in the window, 50% is the middle of the window

Reward1AlignHorizontal.label: Align Horisontal
Reward1AlignHorizontal.tooltip: Align the text in the window, 50% is the middle of the window

Reward1SFXFile.label: SFX file
Reward1SFXFile.tooltip: Specify the SFX file to play on trigger. (include the file extension)

Reward1Volume.label: SFX Volume
Reward1Volume.tooltip: Specify the volume to the SFX effect to trigger.

Reward1Font.label: Font Style
Reward1Font.tooltip: Font style for the counter number. arguments that can be given (in order): "style weight size family"

Reward1Duration.label: Duration
Reward1Duration.tooltip: Specify the number of seconds to wait before attempting to play next alert in queue after starting to play this alert.

RewardTestVolume.label: SFX Volume

RewardTestFont.label: Font Style

RewardTestDuration.label: Length time to play/display the SFX anbd Alert in Seconds
RewardTestDuration.tooltip: Specify the number of seconds to wait before attempting to play next SFX in queue after starting to play this SFX.

TestWSEvent.label: Test WebSocket Event
TestWSEvent.tooltip: Sends a websocket event with test data
